REPORT.name: Прибыль по месяцам
REPORT.description: Прибыль клуба по месяцам. Рекомендуется поверх этого отчета применять фильтрацию за текущий год. --- Author: GameClass Software support@gameclass.ru
REPORT.code:
if object_id('tempdb..#tpm') is not null DROP TABLE #tpm
CREATE TABLE #tpm ( [id] [int] NOT NULL , [name] [varchar] (25) COLLATE Cyrillic_General_CI_AS NULL ) ON [PRIMARY] INSERT INTO #tpm (id, name) VALUES (1, N'Январь') INSERT INTO #tpm (id, name) VALUES (2, N'Февраль') INSERT INTO #tpm (id, name) VALUES (3, N'Март') INSERT INTO #tpm (id, name) VALUES (4, N'Апрель') INSERT INTO #tpm (id, name) VALUES (5, N'Май') INSERT INTO #tpm (id, name) VALUES (6, N'Июнь') INSERT INTO #tpm (id, name) VALUES (7, N'Июль') INSERT INTO #tpm (id, name) VALUES (8, N'Август') INSERT INTO #tpm (id, name) VALUES (9, N'Сентябрь') INSERT INTO #tpm (id, name) VALUES (10, N'Октябрь') INSERT INTO #tpm (id, name) VALUES (11, N'Ноябрь') INSERT INTO #tpm (id, name) VALUES (12, N'Декабрь')
select #tpm.Name as [Месяц], SUM([summa]) as [Сумма] from [repDetails] inner join #tpm on (#tpm.[id] = DATEPART(month, [moment])) GROUP BY #tpm.Name, DATEPART(month, [moment]) order by DATEPART(month, [moment]) asc
